title: Running actions or functions in sequence one after another

cells.data:
id fontsCallMethod = [CCActionCallFunc actionWithTarget:self selector:@selector(displayInfoLabels)]; // Function
  CCActionMoveTo *gameMove = [CCActionMoveTo actionWithDuration:0.5 position:ccp(x, y)]; // Action

[_flyoutGameCenterButton runAction:[CCActionSequence actions:gameMove,fontsCallMethod, nil]]; // run action, then function
